00031 ExportPulse::ExportPulse(modules::options* opts)
00032   : BaseModule("ExportPulse",opts),fGuidanceShown(false)
00033   , fSetup(NULL), fOptions(opts)
00034 {
00035   dir->cd("/");
00036   fPulseInfo.pulseID=-1;
00037   fPulseInfo.event=-1;
00038   fPulseInfo.bankname="";
00039   fPulseInfo.detname="";
00040 }

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 int ExportPulse::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00050   fSetup=setup;
00051   if(!fSetup){
00052     cout<<"Error: TSetupData passed to ExportPulse is NULL..."<<endl;
00053     return 1 ;
00054   }
00055   fTotalEvents = EventNavigator::Instance().GetInputNEntries();
00056   
00058   if(fOptions){
00059     int num=0;
00060     std::vector<std::string> currentList;
00061     std::vector<EventID_t> event_list;
00062     std::vector<TPulseIslandID> pulse_list;
00063     modules::parser::Constructor_t event_pulse_request;
00064     std::string error_type;
00065     // Loop over all options
00066     for(modules::options::OptionsList_t::const_iterator i_opt = fOptions->begin();
00067         i_opt != fOptions->end(); i_opt++){
00068       // Continue if option is not "all" and not one of the detector names:
00069       if( i_opt->first != "all" && fSetup->GetBankName(i_opt->first)=="") continue;
00070       
00071       // Break the list into items
00072       currentList.clear();
00073       event_list.clear();
00074       pulse_list.clear();
00075       num=fOptions->GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(i_opt->first,currentList);
00076       if(num<=0) continue; // no options were actually specified
00077       
00078       for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator i_request=currentList.begin();
00079           i_request!=currentList.end();
00080           i_request++){
00081         event_pulse_request=modules::parser::ParseConstructor(*i_request,'(',')');
00082         // Check things look healthy
00083         if(event_pulse_request.before=="" )error_type="event";
00084         else if( event_pulse_request.inside=="")error_type="pulse";
00085         else if( !ParseEventRequest(event_pulse_request.before, event_list)) error_type="event";
00086         else if( !ParsePulseRequest(event_pulse_request.inside,pulse_list)) error_type="pulse";
00087         if(error_type != ""){
00088           cout<<"Skipping badly formatted "<<error_type<<" specification: "<<*i_request<<endl;
00089           cout<<"event="<<event_pulse_request.before<<", pulse="<<event_pulse_request.inside<<endl;
00090           ShowGuidance();
00091           continue;
00092         }
00093         // Everything is ok so add this request to the list
00094         for(std::vector<EventID_t>::const_iterator i_event=event_list.begin();
00095             i_event!=event_list.end();
00096             i_event++){
00097           for(std::vector<TPulseIslandID>::const_iterator i_pulse=pulse_list.begin();
00098               i_pulse!=pulse_list.end(); i_pulse++){
00099             AddToConfigRequestList(*i_event,i_opt->first,*i_pulse);
00100           }
00101         }
00102       }
00103     }
00104   }
00105   return 0;
00106 }

00109 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 int ExportPulse::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, const TSetupData* gSetup){
00111   // To be corrected once Phill finishes the event navigator
00112   fGlobalData=gData; 
00113   SetCurrentEventNumber(EventNavigator::Instance().EntryNo());
00114   
00115   // Check if we have any pulses to draw that were requested through the MODULEs file
00116   LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig();
00117 
00118   int ret_val=DrawTPIs();
00119   if(ret_val!=0) return ret_val;
00120 
00121   ret_val=DrawTAPs();
00122   if(ret_val!=0) return ret_val;
00123 
00124   ClearPulsesToExport();
00125   return 0;
00126 }

00129 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 int ExportPulse::DrawTAPs(){
00131   // Initialise variables that would be used in the loops
00132   const TAPList_t* requestedPulses;
00133   
00134   // Loop over channel that we've been requested to draw a pulse from
00135   for(ChannelTAPs_t::const_iterator i_detector=fTAPsToPlot.begin();
00136       i_detector!=fTAPsToPlot.end();
00137       i_detector++){
00138     SetCurrentDetectorName(i_detector->first);
00139     
00140     // Get the pulse list for this channel
00141     requestedPulses=&(i_detector->second);
00142     
00143     // Loop over every requested pulse for that channel
00144     for(TAPList_t::const_iterator i_pulse=requestedPulses->begin();
00145       i_pulse!=requestedPulses->end();
00146       i_pulse++){
00147       
00148       SetCurrentPulseID((*i_pulse)->GetParentID());
00149       // Draw the pulse
00150       PlotTAP(*i_pulse,fPulseInfo);
00151       
00152     }
00153   }
00154   return 0;
00155 }

00158 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00159 int ExportPulse::DrawTPIs(){
00160   // Initialise variables that would be used in the loops
00161   TPulseIsland* pulse;
00162   const PulseIDList_t* requestedPulses;
00163   PulseIslandList* pulseList;
00164 
00165   // Loop over channel that we've been requested to draw a pulse from
00166   for(ChannelPulseIDs_t::const_iterator i_detector=fTPIsToPlot.begin();
00167       i_detector!=fTPIsToPlot.end();
00168       i_detector++){
00169     SetCurrentDetectorName(i_detector->first);
00170     
00171     // Get the pulse list for this channel
00172     requestedPulses=&(i_detector->second);
00173     pulseList=GetTPIsFromDetector();
00174     
00175     // Loop over every requested pulse for that channel
00176     for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulseID=requestedPulses->begin();
00177         i_pulseID!=requestedPulses->end();
00178         i_pulseID++){
00179       // Update the pulse info struct
00180       SetCurrentPulseID(*i_pulseID);
00181       
00182       // Get the current requested TPI for this channel
00183       try{
00184         pulse=pulseList->at(*i_pulseID);
00185       }
00186       catch(const std::out_of_range& oor){
00187         cout<<"Skipping out of range pulse: "<<*i_pulseID<<" on detector '"<<i_detector->first<<endl;
00188         continue;
00189       }
00190       
00191       // Draw the pulse
00192       PlotTPI(pulse,fPulseInfo);
00193     }
00194   }
00195   return 0;
00196 }

00198 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 std::string ExportPulse::PulseInfo_t::MakeTPIName()const{
00200   std::stringstream histname;
00201   histname << "Pulse_" << detname;
00202   histname << "_" << event;
00203   histname << "_" << pulseID;
00204   std::string hist=histname.str();
00205   // replace all non c++ characters with underscore so we can use the
00206   // histograms in root directly.
00207   modules::parser::ToCppValid(hist);
00208   return hist;
00209 }

00211 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 int ExportPulse::PlotTPI(const TPulseIsland* pulse, const PulseInfo_t& info)const{
00213   
00214   std::string hist=info.MakeTPIName();
00215   
00216   std::stringstream title;
00217   title << "Pulse " << info.pulseID;
00218   title << " from event " << info.event;
00219   title << " on detector " << info.detname;
00220   title << " (" << info.bankname<<")";
00221   
00222   // Print some stuff if wanted
00223   if(Debug()){
00224     cout<<"Plotting "<<title.str()<<"' ["<<hist<<"]"<<endl;
00225   }
00226   
00227   size_t num_samples = pulse->GetPulseLength();
00228   double min=0;
00229   double max= num_samples;
00230   //double min= (pulse->GetTimeStamp() * fClockTick) - fTimeShift;
00231   //double max= min + num_samples * fClockTick;
00232   TH1F* hPulse = new TH1F(hist.c_str(), title.str().c_str(), num_samples,min,max);
00233   
00234   double pedestal_error = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetNoise(IDs::channel(info.detname));
00235   for ( size_t i=0;i <num_samples; ++i) {
00236     hPulse->SetBinContent(i+1, pulse->GetSamples().at(i));
00237     hPulse->SetBinError(i+1, pedestal_error);
00238   }
00239   
00240   return 0;
00241 }

00244 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00245 int ExportPulse::PlotTAP(const TAnalysedPulse* pulse, const PulseInfo_t& info)const{
00246   std::string hist=info.MakeTPIName();
00247   TH1F* tpi_hist=NULL;
00248   gDirectory->GetObject(hist.c_str(),tpi_hist);
00249   pulse->Draw(tpi_hist);
00250   return 0;
00251 }

00253 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 PulseIslandList* ExportPulse::GetTPIsFromDetector(std::string bank){
00255   if(bank=="") bank=this->GetCurrentBankName();
00256   return &fGlobalData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[bank];
00257 }

00260 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 void ExportPulse::ShowGuidance()
00262 {
00263   // Only show guidance once
00264   if(fGuidanceShown) return;
00265   fGuidanceShown=true;
00266   cout<<"Requests to draw a pulse should be formatted as event(pulse),"<<endl;
00267   cout<<" where event and pulse are the numbers of each event and pulse you wish to draw"<<endl;
00268   //", a range (specified by A-Z, where A and Z are the first and last value of the range),"
00269   //" or a number of random events to select (specified by ~N where N is the number of events)";
00270 }

00274 bool ExportPulse::ParseEventRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& event_list)
00275 {
00276   return ParseRequest(input,event_list,"event",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00277 }

00280 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00281 bool ExportPulse::ParsePulseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list)
00282 {
00283   return ParseRequest(input,list,"pulse",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00284 }

00287 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 bool ExportPulse::ParseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list, const std::string& type, Long64_t lower_limit, Long64_t upper_limit)
00289 {
00290   // Strip all whitespace
00291   modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(input);
00292   
00293   // Check if input string contains a number,
00294   if(modules::parser::IsNumber(input)){
00295     int event = modules::parser::GetNumber(input);
00296     if (event >=lower_limit && event < upper_limit ){
00297       list.push_back(event);
00298     } else {
00299       cout<<"Requested "<<type<<", "<<event<<" is out of range."<<endl;
00300       cout<<"Acceptable values are: ["<<lower_limit<<","<<upper_limit<<"[."<<endl;
00301       return false;
00302     }
00303     return true;
00304   }
00305   // Future Ideas:
00306   // Check if input contains a range,
00307   // Check if input contains a random request
00308   return false;
00309 }

00312 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 void ExportPulse::LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig(){
00314   // 7) In Process entry, invoke a method to check if there were requested or a pulse on a channel in this event
00315   //    and load them into fTPIsToPlot;
00316   
00317   for(EventChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel=fRequestedByConfig.begin();
00318       i_channel!=fRequestedByConfig.end(); i_channel++){
00319     EventPulseIDList_t::iterator i_event=i_channel->second.find(GetCurrentEventNumber());
00320     if(i_event!=i_channel->second.end()){
00321       for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulse=i_event->second.begin();
00322           i_pulse!=i_event->second.end(); i_pulse++){
00323         AddToExportList(i_channel->first,*i_pulse);
00324       }
00325     }
00326   }
00327   
00328   // Check if all channels were requested
00329 }

00332 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 void ExportPulse::ClearPulsesToExport(){
00334   ChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel;
00335   for (i_channel=fTPIsToPlot.begin();i_channel!=fTPIsToPlot.end();i_channel++){
00336                   i_channel->second.clear();
00337   }
00338   fTPIsToPlot.clear();
00339   fTAPsToPlot.clear();
00340 }
